items.name: Dialla's Malefaction
explicitMods: Gems can be Socketed in this Item ignoring Socket Colour
Gems Socketed in Red Sockets have +2 to Level
Gems Socketed in Green Sockets have +30% to Quality
Gems Socketed in Blue Sockets gain 100% increased Experience
Has no Attribute Requirements
flavourText: He took me by my hand, promised me power beyond compare.
But I did not do it for power.
And I'd do it again in an instant.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Summons a totem that shakes the earth around it, knocking back and damaging nearby enemies
explicitMods: Deals 460 to 854 Physical Damage
Totem lasts 8 seconds
Supported Skills have 20% increased Totem Life
25% chance to Knock Enemies Back on hit
Summons a Totem which uses this Skill
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Waits for a duration before teleporting to a targeted destination, with the duration based on the distance and your movement speed. Casting again will queue up multiple teleportations to occur in sequence.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Creates a crystal that pulses with cold for a duration. 4% more Damage with Hits per 0.1 seconds Duration
Base duration is 2.00 seconds
